subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dustin Byfuglien had two goals and an assist for the Chicago Blackhawks, who set a franchise record Sunday by collecting their ninth straight victory, defeating the host Minnesota Wild, 4-1.
snippet: Dustin Byfuglien had two goals and an assist for the Chicago Blackhawks, who set a franchise record Sunday by collecting their ninth straight victory, defeating the host Minnesota Wild, 4-1.
